name: Abdul-Basir Ahmed-Jan
story: Born and raised in a small village in Afghanistan, Abdul-Basir grew up with a deep sense of duty to his family and community. After finishing his education, he joined the Afghan army to defend his homeland against foreign forces. When the war ended, he found himself without a job and struggling to make ends meet. Desperate for a way to provide for his family, he joined a private military company and has been fighting for various causes ever since.
